articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of CPV Central Committee
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of CPV Central Committee
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a reply message from Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV), on January 30.
					 The 12th Congress of the CPV was successfully held in Hanoi, capital city of Vietnam, from Jan. 20 to 28, 2016, the message said.
					
					 The general secretary in the message said he, on behalf of the CPV Central Committee, expresses wholehearted thanks to the WPK Central Committee for sending sincere congratulations to the 12th Congress of the CPV.
					
					 This greatly encouraged its advance, the message said.
					
					 The 12th Congress of the CVP marks an important political event in the political life of the entire Vietnamese nation and an important landmark in Vietnam's cause of innovation, joining in international integration and cause of socialist construction, the message noted, adding
					
					 The congress adopted important documents and elected the new leadership of the party.
					
					 Availing himself of the opportunity, the general secretary expressed sincere thanks to Kim Jong Un for expressing wholehearted congratulations and friendship to him upon his reelection as general secretary of the CPV Central Committee.
					
					 The message expressed conviction that the good traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, two states and two peoples would steadily grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples and for peace, stability, cooperation and prosperity of the region and the rest of the world.

articles.title: History Society of DPRK Asserts Nullification of Japan-S. Korea "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
History Society of DPRK Asserts Nullification of Japan-S. Korea "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- At the end of last year, the Japanese and south Korean ruling forces held a meeting of foreign ministers in Seoul in which they reached an "agreement" on the "final and irreversible settlement" of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 A spokesman for the History Society of the DPRK issued a statement on Saturday in denunciation of the foolish acts of the Japanese and south Korean ruling forces which fabricated the "agreement" and the U.S. which wire-pulled it.
					
					 The statement said that the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army can never be concealed with ease as it is the worst abuse of women's rights and heinous war crimes in which the Japanese imperialists forced the sexual slavery upon 200 000 Korean women in battle sites of wars of aggression by setting in motion the state power in the past time and mercilessly killed most of them.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army fabricated by the U.S., Japanese and south Korean ruling forces in collusion is null and void and can never be tolerated.
					
					 The historians of the DPRK will settle accounts with Japan, sworn enemy of the Korean people who insulted again the hundreds of thousands of victims of the sexual slavery, and the puppet group of traitors to the end and will further boost the joint action and solidarity activities with the south Korean and world progressive historians for a probe into the truth about the crimes related to sexual slavery by the Japanese imperialists and the proper settlement of the issue on sexual slavery in the future.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is hideous one against humanity to which no statute of limitations is applicable and Japan's history of crimes can never be concealed with anything.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction Site of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction Site of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction sites of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 and the Hyesan-Samjiyon Broad Gauge.
					 Going round various places of the construction sites, the premier encouraged the builders who are all out in a high-pitched drive to glorify the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as the congress of victors and glory.
					
					 A consultative meeting discussed the measures for pushing forward the construction to suit the winter conditions without interruption and sufficiently supplying the necessary materials.
					
					 The premier went round various places in Samjiyon County associated with the leadership exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. At a consultative meeting he called for meticulously conducting the management and operation of the objects successfully renovated under the loving care of the party and discussed the matters arising in stepping up the preparations for photo farming.

articles.title: Big Aid to Construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
articles.content:
Big Aid to Construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
Paekam, February 6 (KCNA) -- People of the DPRK make big aids to the construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3. 
					 Workers of relevant factories and enterprises increase production of building materials. 
					
					 Officials of the ministries and national institutions visited the construction site to give more than 1 000 kinds of aid materials to the shock brigade members. 
					
					 Officials and working people in North Hwanghae Province went to the construction site with 10 odd big trucks fully loaded with aid materials to encourage the shock brigade members. 
					
					 A lot of aid materials were sent to the construction site by Pyongyang City, North Hamgyong and South Hwanghae provinces.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Comes Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Comes Back Home
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Pak Myong Guk returned home on Saturday after visiting Russia.

articles.title: Quality Products Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Quality Products Increase in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Quality products are increasing in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea amid a brisk emulation drive to improve the quality of goods.
					 On February 2, Juche 70 (1981), President Kim Il Sung convened a national conference of quality control workers, stressing the importance to improve the quality of products and tighten the quality control.
					
					 Since then, a work has been conducted on the day every year to register as February 2 Goods those products which win high appraisal at international and domestic shows.
					
					 Many products were registered as February 2 Goods this year.
					
					 They include functional cosmetics produced by the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory and tonics and foodstuffs produced by the Kaesong Insam Processing Factory. There are also Korean liquors produced by the Pyongyang Beer Factory and the Sariwon Kyongam Liquor Factory and dinner utensils.

articles.title: KPA, Elite Armed Forces Displaying Tradition of Invincibility
articles.content:
KPA, Elite Armed Forces Displaying Tradition of Invincibility
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- On February 8, Juche 37 (1948) President Kim Il Sung proclaimed the birth of the Korean People's Army, the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 Guided by the Juche idea, the KPA assumes a mission to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms, carrying forward the traditions of anti-Japanese revolution.
					
					 After its foundation, the heroic KPA had covered a course of victory and glory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialist aggressors, it worked such world-startling military miracles as shooting down B-29s of the U.S. forces and torpedoing their heavy cruiser Baltimore.
					
					 Over the last decades of confrontation with the U.S., the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK had frustrated its war moves for aggression.
					
					 Today the KPA, under the guidance of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, has further strengthened into the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army equipped with powerful strike means and ever-victorious war methods capable of coping on its own initiative with any sort of confrontation--a local war with use of conventional weapons, an all-out war, electronic warfare and a nuclear war.
					
					 Its might was clearly displayed through flight combat drills by fighter and bomber groups under the Guards 1st Air and Anti-Air Division of the Air and Anti-Air Force, drill of all services for striking the enemy's naval targets, drill for striking and seizing island, test-fire of new type cutting-edge anti-ship rocket capable of striking any enemy fleet from a long distance, test of SLBM, etc.
					
					 Thanks to the invincible KPA, the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula is being reliably defended.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Flailed for Denying History of Aggression and War
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Flailed for Denying History of Aggression and War
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A former vice-minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan said at a joint meeting of foreign relations of the Liberal Democratic Party that victims of sexual slavery "were professional prostitutes" and "Japan is being seriously deceived by information service in which they are regarded as victims". Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida said in a speech at the Diet that Tok Islets belong to Japan, undisguisedly revealing its ambition for aggression before the world.
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms these remarks a despicable one which can be done only by the cunning Japanese reactionaries.
					
					The commentary goes on:
					
					Still heard in Japan are voices there is no need to feel guilty conscience toward the past history and that the Japanese can not allow their children, grandchildren and posterity to face the fate of being indebted to make apologies.
					
					The Japanese authorities are showing off a purse anywhere but there is a problem to be mentioned certainly here. The silk quilt the so-called "economic power" is sleeping under is drenched with blood and sweats shed by tens of millions of Koreans.
					
					The offer of the whole of Japan will never be enough reparation for the human, material, cultural, mental and moral losses it imposed on the Korean people.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries are denying the history of aggression and war in a bid to bring back the past history anytime to realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					The Japanese politicians should be honest before history and human beings, to begin with.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Getting United Close around WPK under Banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Getting United Close around WPK under Banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- An enlarged joint meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean People's Army Committee of the WPK took place with a few months off the Seventh Congress of the WPK. The meeting was a demonstration of the steadfast faith of the WPK, the army and people to arm themselves with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, get united close around the Central Committee of the Party led by Marshal Kim Jong Un and accelerate the final victory of the Juche revolution under his leadership.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an editorial:
					
					 To thoroughly establish the monolithic leadership system of the party under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as a fundamental guarantee for glorifying the party as the eternal party of the leader and the great party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should bear in mind the historic mission they have assumed before the era and the revolution, follow the road indicated by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and uphold the party's idea and leadership with one mind and intention no matter what violent storm they may face. 
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as an ideological foundation of the single-minded unity and the cornerstone of our party and the revolutionary ranks.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the one and only center of unity and leadership and get united close around him.
					
					 Nothing can break the single-minded unity in which the service personnel and people are rallied around the party and the leader as firm as a rock and no one on earth can block the Korean people advancing with the might of the unity.
					
					 All the Koreans should get united closer around the WPK under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and accelerate the final victory of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Single-Minded Unity, Source of Inexhaustible Strength of Great Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Single-Minded Unity, Source of Inexhaustible Strength of Great Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Single-minded unity is the revolutionary philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and serves as the source of inexhaustible strength of the great Paektusan nation, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Saturday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The WPK has wisely led the drive to dye the whole society with the monolithic idea, regarding it as a prerequisite and essential requirement of the single-minded unity to firmly establish the oneness of the idea and leadership.
					
					 Now the might of the single-minded unity in the DRPK has remarkably grown strong amid the grand advance to model the whole party and society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 This unity is like a matchless fortress cemented on the people-first principle.
					
					 The WPK's devoted service and warm loving care for the people made them keep the unshakable faith to travel one road forever following the party, and linked the party and the people through one blood vessel.
					
					 The above-said unity serves as an invincible treasured sword for winning the final victory despite the violent storm of history.
					
					 No matter how mean psychological warfare and bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning the enemies may employ in a crafty and vicious manner to disorganize the DPRK from within, the single-minded unity will remain unaffected as it has been consolidated in the tempest of the revolution.
					
					 The DPRK will consolidate the single-minded unity of the party and revolutionary ranks centered on Marshal Kim Jong Un in every way and successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu by dint of unity, the article concludes.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Campaign Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Campaign Denounced
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- South Korean political philistines finally decided to adopt the "law on human rights in the north" days ago after years of persistent rhetoric about "human rights situation in the north". 
					 This is the height of impudence and shamelessness, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article. 
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The traitorous group of colonial stooges, fascist tyrants and parasites on the community, who sell off the interests of the nation to outside forces without hesitation, talk about "human rights issue" of the DPRK. It is an insult to and mockery of the sacred human rights and a funny political cartoon. 
					
					 Their story about "human rights in the north" is aiming at covering up their despicable unpopular nature and defaming the brilliant reality in the DPRK, earthly paradise of human rights. 
					
					 Much upset by their failed ambition, the traitorous group is desperately resorting to anti-DPRK confrontation campaign, pinning hope on the "human rights" racket like a drowning man catching at a straw.
					
					 No matter what plots they may make, it is foolish an act as trying to get the sun eclipsed by their palms. 
					
					 Their persistent anti-DPRK confrontation campaign will end with a miserable ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Denounces U.S. for Increasing Danger of Nuclear War
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Denounces U.S. for Increasing Danger of Nuclear War
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy held a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 4 to denounce the U.S. for increasing the danger of a nuclear war in the Korean Peninsula, according to Minjok Ilbo, the internet paper of south Korea.
					 The organization in a statement said that the U.S. is not ruling out murder and war for its interests, and is insulting the north as an "axis of evil" and staging north-targeted nuclear war drills every year, rendering the situation strained.
					
					 The prevailing situation in the Korean Peninsula reminds one of the eve of war as the U.S. is pushing forward the deployment of THAAD in south Korea, lets fly nuclear bombers and plans Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises soon, the statement noted.
					
					 If the present regime continues taking the road of war against fellow countrymen while cooperating with the U.S., it will not be able to escape fatal destiny, it warned.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants marched as far as the building of the "government".

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Nakhodka, Russia on February 1.
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to praise revolutionary careers and exploits of the great leaders on the above-said occasions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Men of Mt. Paektu, the Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il), the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on January 29 on the occasion of his 74th birth anniversary.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country with his matchless courage and will in the closing years of the last century when the U.S. increased the nuclear threat.
					
					 By having an access to a powerful nuclear deterrent the DPRK clearly showed the U.S. and its allied forces what a bitter price they will be made to pay for if they make an attack on it again.
					
					 Thanks to the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il the DPRK has turned into an invincible socialist power and an impregnable fortress, making the history of victory.
					
					 The DPRK successfully conducted the third underground nuclear test in February 2013 and the first H-bomb test on January 6 this year.
					
					 Today the DPRK's nuclear deterrent firmly defends the sovereignty of the country and guarantees the just cause of the Korean people for building a thriving nation and accomplishing the national reunification as a legendary treasured sword of Songun and a powerful defence means for smashing all challenges of provokers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Congolese, Italian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Congolese, Italian Media
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Congolese and Italian media carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Agence Congolaise d'Information on January 29 posted articles on its website under the headline "February 16, the Day of the Shining Star of the DPRK" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The website in its preface praised him as the greatest man who performed immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 He defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation by pursuing the original Songun politics and opened up a prosperous era unprecedented in the 5 000-year-old history of the nation.
					
					 The Korean people are vigorously advancing toward the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with the same spirit as was displayed in succeeding in the first H-bomb test.
					
					 They will build a thriving socialist nation without fail true to the behest of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The January issue of the Italian magazine La Voce carried an article titled "Eternal leader Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The magazine praised him as an outstanding thinker and theoretician, great master of leadership and benevolent father of the people.
					
					 It introduced his immortal contribution to the cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Russian Newspaper
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The part dealing with Korea's reunification in the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un was carried by the Russian newspaper Khabarovski Express on January 26.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty Supported by Bulgarian Personage
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty Supported by Bulgarian Personage
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A member of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and a Bulgarian expert on the East Asian affairs had a televised news conference on Jan. 14 as regards the DPRK's successful H-bomb test.
					 The member said that the U.S. is the only country which inflicted the holocaust upon humankind by using the nuclear weapons in the world before going on:
					
					 Huge U.S. troops station in south Korea and there is no guarantee that the troops will not attack the DPRK anytime
					
					 So far, the DPRK has made several proposals for concluding a peace treaty with the U.S. only to be denied.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are wholly to blame for a failure in concluding the peace treaty.
					
					 The expert on the East Asian affairs said:
					
					 Large-scale military drills are staged in south Korea and its vicinities every year, targeting the DPRK's nuclear facilities and other core objects.
					
					 The DPRK is pursuing the policy of never allowing any provocation against its sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK maintains the conclusion of the peace treaty.

articles.title: U.S. Compels DPRK to Develop Nuclear Deterrent: Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Compels DPRK to Develop Nuclear Deterrent: Brazilian Organization
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article on Jan. 20 as regards the DPRK's successful test of its first H-bomb.
					 The article said that the Korean people were compelled to fight a war and undergo the tragedy of national division owing to the U.S. imperialists' ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. bisected the Korean Peninsula and is resorting to the moves for blockading the DPRK.
					
					 Have access to the powerful war deterrent such as nuclear weapons is the only way for the Korean people to guarantee their sovereignty and defend the nation.
					
					 The DPRK's development of H-bomb will bolster up its war deterrent in every way.
					
					 What is interesting is that the DPRK's development of the nuclear weapons does not threaten world peace as was propagandized by the U.S. and West but ensures it.
					
					 No sovereignty means no right.
					
					 It is just the U.S. which threatens global peace and compels the DPRK to develop the nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: AHC califica de acto antihistorico el "acuerdo" Japon-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
AHC califica de acto antihistorico el "acuerdo" Japon-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En las conversaciones entre los ministros de Relaciones Exteriores efectuadas en Seul a finales del ano pasado, Japon y el Sur de Corea "acordaron" la "resolucion final e irreversible" del problema de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					El portavoz de la Asociacion de Historiadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 6 una declaracion condenando a Japon y los gobernantes surcoreanos, firmantes de ese "acuerdo", y el acto antihistorico de Estados Unidos que lo controlo a puertas cerradas.
					
					El caso de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones es el intolerable crimen de guerra y de violacion de DDHH contra mujeres, revela la nota y continua:
					
					En el pasado los imperialistas japoneses arrestaron a 200 mil mujeres coreanas a los campos de guerra de agresion, les obligaron la horrorosa vida de esclavitud sexual y asesinaron la mayoria de ellas, movilizando el Poder estatal.
					
					Es totalmente invalido e imperdonable el "acuerdo" sobre la esclavitud sexual, inventado por la confabulacion de EE.UU., Japon y los gobernantes surcoreanos 
					
					Los historiadores de la RPDC saldaran la cuenta final del enemigo jurado Japon y la horda de traidores surcoreanos que volvieron a insultar a cientos de miles de victimas de la esclavitud sexual y dinamizaran las acciones conjuntas y las actividades solidarias con los sabios surcoreanos y los demas progresistas del mundo para revelar la verdad del crimen de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones y resolver este problema. 
					
					El crimen de esclavitud sexual de caracter antietico no tiene la prescripcion.
					
					No se puede ocultar con nada la historia criminal.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre lugar de construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre lugar de construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, hizo detallado conocimiento en el terreno de la marcha de la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3 y de la ferrovia Hyesan-Samjiyon.
					Recorriendo los lugares de construccion, Pak estimulo a los miembros de la brigada y los constructores que desarrollan con dinamismo la ofensiva general por hacer brillar el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como conclave de los triunfadores y de la gloria.
					
					En la reunion de consulta realizada en el terreno se tomaron las medidas por impulsar sin cesar la obra conforme a las condiciones invernales y asegurar suficientemente los materiales necesarios a la construccion.
					
					El premier recorrio varios lugares del distrito Samjiyon donde estan impregnadas las hazanas de direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y convoco una reunion de consulta para discutir los problemas de organizar con escrupulosidad la administracion de los objetos magnificamente reconstruidos gracias a la benevolencia del Partido y acelerar los preparativos de cultivo de patatas.

articles.title: Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares
articles.content:
Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- El 8 de febrero del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche es un dia de gran significacion en el desarrollo de la revolucion coreana y la forja del destino del pueblo.
					Ese dia, el Presidente Kim Il Sung declaro al mundo el nacimiento del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					
					Esta declaracion historica anuncio la realizacion brillante de la causa de la construccion del ejercito regular que tiene la noble mision de llevar al feliz termino la causa revolucionaria jucheana, iniciada con fusil teniendo como la idea directriz la inmortal Idea Juche y heredando la tradicion revolucionaria antijaponesa.
					
					Bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el heroico EPC vino avanzando por la senda de la victoria y gloria.
					
					En la pasada guerra coreana de la decada de 1950, el EPC registro numerosos milagros militares derribando el bombardero estrategico B-29 y hundiendo al crucero pesado "Baltimore", de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas.
					
					Durante decenas de anos pasados en que se desarrollo la confrontacion con Estados Unidos, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC frustraron las maniobras de guerra de agresion de EE.UU. que se autodenominaba como "unica superpotencia" del mundo.
					
					Hoy en dia, en el regazo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el EPC se ha fortalecido mas como poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.
					
					Se ha crecido como ejercito poderoso dotado de los invencibles metodos de combate y los medios de ataque capaces de hacer frente a las cualesquier confrontaciones tales como la guerra local basada en las armas convencionales, la guerra total, la electronica y la nuclear.
					
					Gracias al EPC, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias sin rival, la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana se defienden confiablemente.
